name: Pauline Hanson
office1: Leader and National Chairman of, Pauline Hanson's One Nation
predecessor1: Herself  (in title, Jim Savage as National Chairman)
office3: Leader of Pauline Hanson's, United Australia Party
office4: Member of the Australian Parliament for Oxley
occupation: Politician;, Socialite, Activist  (various, primarily opposition to Islam and multiculturalism) , Businesswoman  (Fish and chips, Real estate)
spouse: Walter Zagorski  (m. 1971; div. 1976) ,  Mark Hanson  (m. 1978; div. 1987)
children: Anthony Zagorski  (son; born 1972) , Steven Zagorski  (son; born 1975) , Adam Hanson  (son; born 1981) , Lee Hanson  (daughter; born 1984)
